pageContext.claim: “Based on the recent data from more than 20 colleges, not a single student who tested positive for the virus has been hospitalized. So that's a lot of people. That's a lot of students. Not one has been hospitalized.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referring to data tweeted by an assistant professor at Brown University. The tweet however has been criticized for cherry-picking data, as there have been reports of college students being hospitalized for covid-19. Moreover, not all colleges report hospitalizations.
